TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 包含与工作流实例终止关联的数据。

span.span: Contains data associated with the termination of a workflow instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 当工作流实例终止时，运行时跟踪基础结构将生成一个 。A is generated by the runtime tracking infrastructure when a workflow instance is terminated. 如果与工作流实例关联的 包括为 配置的 ，工作流跟踪基础结构会将 放在 中（位于它发送到跟踪服务的 中）。If the associated with a workflow instance includes a configured for a , the workflow tracking infrastructure puts the in in the that it sends to the tracking service. 工作流实例可能会通过以下三种方式之一终止：宿主可能调用 ；可能会从工作流实例内部调用 活动；或者可能会发生未经处理的异常。A workflow instance may be terminated in one of three ways: the host may call ; a activity may be invoked from inside the workflow instance; or an unhandled exception may occur. 如果工作流被宿主或 活动终止，运行时跟踪基础结构会将 设置为 ，其 属性设置为终止原因的说明。If the workflow is terminated by the host or a activity, the runtime tracking infrastructure sets to a that has its property set to a description of the reason for the termination. 如果工作流由于未经处理的异常而终止，运行时跟踪基础结构将在 中传递未经处理的异常。If the workflow is terminated because of an unhandled exception, the runtime tracking infrastructure passes the unhandled exception in . > [!NOTE] > 仅由运行时跟踪服务使用，以在 中传递信息。 is used only by the runtime tracking service to pass information in a . 事件的数据在 中传递。The data for a event is passed in a . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个名为 `WriteTerminatedEventArgs` 的方法，该方法可捕获 。The following code example demonstrates a method, named `WriteTerminatedEventArgs`, which captures a . 代码将检查 属性是否为 `null`（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`）。The code checks whether the property is `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic). 如果不是，代码会将与 属性关联的消息写入控制台。If it is not, the code writes the message associated with the property to the console. 如果 为 `null` (`Nothing`)，则代码不会将任何异常信息写入控制台。If is `null` (`Nothing`), the code does not write any exception information to the console. 此代码示例摘自 Program.cs 文件中的 EventArgs 跟踪 SDK 示例。This code example is part of the EventArgs Tracking SDK Sample from the Program.cs file. 有关详细信息，请参阅[EventArgs 跟踪示例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/94818da2-c3c4-4a13-b47a-a0fb30dbbf1c)。For more information, see [EventArgs Tracking Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/94818da2-c3c4-4a13-b47a-a0fb30dbbf1c). [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#288](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets24.cs#288)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#288](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets24.vb#288)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Exception As Exception
public: property Exception ^ Exception { Exception ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取导致工作流实例终止的异常。

span.span: Gets the exception that caused the workflow instance to be terminated.

value.span: 导致工作流实例终止的 。

span.span: The that caused the workflow instance to be terminated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当工作流实例由于未经处理的异常而终止时， 将包含未经处理的异常。When the workflow instance is terminated because of an unhandled exception, contains the unhandled exception. 当工作流实例由于宿主对 的调用或由于 活动而终止时， 包含一个 ，其 属性设置为终止原因的说明。When the workflow instance is terminated by either a host call to or by a activity, contains a that has its property set to a description of the reason for the termination. 如果宿主终止了工作流实例，它会在 `string` 的 参数中提供此说明；如果 终止了工作流实例，则该说明由 提供。If the host terminates the workflow instance, it supplies this description in the `string` parameter to ; if the workflow instance is terminated by a , the description is supplied by . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个名为 `WriteTerminatedEventArgs` 的方法，该方法可捕获 。The following code example demonstrates a method, named `WriteTerminatedEventArgs`, which captures a . 代码将检查 属性是否为 `null`（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`）。The code checks whether the property is `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic). 如果不是，代码会将与 属性关联的消息写入控制台。If it is not, the code writes the message associated with the property to the console. 如果 为 `null` (`Nothing`)，则代码不会将任何异常信息写入控制台。If is `null` (`Nothing`), the code does not write any exception information to the console. 此代码示例摘自 Program.cs 文件中的 EventArgs 跟踪 SDK 示例。This code example is part of the EventArgs Tracking SDK Sample from the Program.cs file. 有关详细信息，请参阅[EventArgs 跟踪示例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/94818da2-c3c4-4a13-b47a-a0fb30dbbf1c)。For more information, see [EventArgs Tracking Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/94818da2-c3c4-4a13-b47a-a0fb30dbbf1c).
